candidates.name: Heavy Compute:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: If you need 50+ seconds per request (training, video processing), Clodo has 30-second limit

candidates.name: AWS-Specific Services:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: If you need SageMaker, Rekognition, etc., stay on AWS

candidates.name: Compliance:
candidates.acceptedAnswer: If you need specific region isolation (GDPR in Germany only), Lambda offers more options
